vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἐπαιν-ετός, ή, όν,
to be praised, praiseworthy, laudable, [Refs 5th c.BC+]the object of praise, [Refs 4th c.BC+]: comparative, [Refs 1st c.AD+]. adverb -τῶς[Refs 1st c.BC+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Rom.16.5
§ - praised; Epænetus, a Christian
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
以拜尼土 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "值得稱讚的"
一位羅馬的基督徒, 保羅向他問安(羅16:5)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
以拜尼土 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "值得称赞的"
一位罗马的基督徒, 保罗向他问安(罗16:5)
